InstalledItem.Name: Slipstream
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Stealth

Tyler Design & Tech uses an expensive alloy on its Slipstream power plant to reduce its overall emissions. This design choice is key to making this small power plant’s detectable signature one of the lowest on the market.

InstalledItem.Name: HeatSafe
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech	
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Pilots looking to keep their IR signature low rely on Tyler Design & Tech. As an entry level cooler, the HeatSafe not only limits emissions, it is built with Tyler’s satisfaction guarantee.

InstalledItem.Name: Shimmer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Ascension Astro is known for one thing — quality stealth components. Their Shimmer shield generator was built not only to help avoid detection, but also provide protection when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: Capston
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Experience why WillsOp is a premiere manufacturer of ship electronics with their Capston radar. Outfit your ship with one today so you know what’s nearby.

InstalledItem.Name: Expedition
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Tarsus 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Cruise through space confident that your perfectly balanced Expedition quantum drive from Tarsus will get you exactly where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: Explorer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Explorer jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-341 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 4xS1

Behring’s MSD-341 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S1 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: TaskForce I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Tracking Signal: Electromagnetic
Size: 1

Venturing into the weapons market, Thermyte Concern have pooled their extensive knowledge of demolition explosives to create the TaskForce. A lightweight EM tracking strike missile with a top-in-class propulsion system provides an efficient mixture of speed and firepower to establish battlefield dominance.
